entry.title: Biography
entry.summary: Member of the Chamber of Fine Arts of Greece. Born and…
entry.content:
Member of the Chamber of Fine Arts of Greece.

Born and lives in Athens.

In her school years she studied with artist Eugenia Markakis and later attended a workshop in design and color with artist Tassos Rigas.

During her studies at Vakalo School she was taught basic drawing, synthesis, painting, art history, jewellery and sculpture by artist Iro Kanakakis, artist â engraver Roubina Sarelakou, artist Tassos Matzavinos, sculptor Kyriakos Rokos, art history teacher Yiannis Papaioannou and sculptress Zanin Baet.

She graduated third in 1997 and got a certificate of BA Honours of Arts & Design from University of Derby, England.

She was selected and participated in the Research Group of Graphic Design of Vakalo School during the academic year 1997-1998.

In 1999 she painted the scenes of the play âOutryâ by Tennessee Wiliams at Georgeâs Armenis New Greek Theatre, inspired by the mockup of the artist â engraver Roubina Sarelakou, in cooperation with her and the artists George Tserionis, Stefanos Rokos, Giuliano Kagli andÂ  Farida El Gazzar.

In December 2012 she made an art mockup for a mural, inspired by lyrics of Nobel Laureate poet Odysseas Elytis, for the 7th Hihg school of Kallithea, in which she added some elements from the kids mockups and till May 2014, she together with 20 kids from Bâ class of high school worked on this mural.

She has presented her artist work in solo exhibitions and participated in group work as well, in Greece and abroad.

In publishing she has been involved with illustrations in childrenâs books and particularly printed materials.

Since September 2014, she Studies in the Technological Educational Institute of Athens, in the Department of Concervation of Antiquities & Works of Art, with the Art teachers Praxitelis Tzanoulinos â Sculptor & Thrassos Avaritsiotis â Visual Artist.

Â She works as a painter, sings in a choir & plays the drums & percussion in a Brazilian Band of Batucada.
